name: dlm-js
description: JavaScript re-implementation of the MATLAB dlm library using jax-js-nonconsuming

scripts.gen:svg:energy-mle: npx tsx scripts/collect-energy-mle-frames.ts && npx tsx scripts/gen-energy-mle-anim-svg.ts
scripts.gen:svg: pnpm run gen:svg:nile && pnpm run gen:svg:kaisaniemi && pnpm run gen:svg:trigar && pnpm run gen:svg:nile-mle && pnpm run gen:svg:energy-mle
scripts.test:octave: octave-cli --no-gui tests/octave/niledemo.m && octave-cli --no-gui tests/octave/gensys_tests.m && octave-cli --no-gui tests/octave/kaisaniemi_demo.m
scripts.test: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:octave && pnpm run test:node
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run build && pnpm run test
